text: Mount Tai () is a mountain in Sandong province, China. It is very important in Chinese culture. It is tall. Cangdi is the deity traditionally said to rule the mountain. The famous festival Feng Shan happens on the mountain. == Related pages == * List of World Heritage Sites in China * Dongyue Emperor * Mount Tai earthquake == References == == Other websites == * * * * WCMC Description * "Tai Shan, China" on Peakbagger Category:Mountains of China Category:World Heritage Sites in China Category:Shandong
title: Mount Tai
